paragraphs.text: Download this zip and unpack it under a directory 'les19'

Run this server. We used ajv-forms and ajv-forms-serializer (own products) available from 1.2.2021 with 'npm ajv-forms' and 'npm ajv-forms-serializer'.
It uses ajv, more than 30.000.000 per week!
All based on json schema!

The standards for javascript and html are managed by Mozilla.
Last years there happend a lot on WebComponents, very compact, light weight web apps can be made using these technics and embedded everywhere.
See also courses of Java (and webapp) Guru Adam Bien.
You should see this Webapps without Frameworks
